                    <p>Palit GeForce RTX 5080 GameRock - Grafikkarten - GeForce RTX 5080 - 16 GB GDDR7 - PCI Express 5.0 - HDMI, 3 x DisplayPort - Box</p><ul><li><strong>Leistungsstarke Speicherkapazität</strong><br />Mit 16 GB GDDR7 SDRAM und einer 256-Bit-Busbreite bietet diese Grafikkarte reichlich Speicher, der eine schnelle Datenverarbeitung für hochwertige Spiele und Multimedia-Erlebnisse unterstützt.</li><li><strong>Effizientes Kühlsystem</strong><br />Mit der Dampfkammer-Kühltechnologie und dem TurboFan Blade 4.0-Kühler sorgt die GeForce RTX 5080 für ein effektives Wärmemanagement und damit für optimale Leistung bei intensiven Gaming-Sessions.</li><li><strong>Vielseitige Unterstützung für mehrere Monitore</strong><br />Die Karte unterstützt bis zu 4 Monitore mit einer Auflösung von bis zu 7680 x 4320 und ermöglicht so ein Multi-Screen-Setup, das die Produktivität und das Spielvergnügen verbessert.</li><li><strong>Fortschrittliche Gaming-Technologien</strong><br />Funktionen wie NVIDIA G-Sync, Reflex 2 und NVIDIA Highlights optimieren das Gameplay, reduzieren Verzögerungen und ermöglichen die Erfassung von Schlüsselmomenten in Echtzeit.</li><li><strong>Robuste Bauweise und mitgeliefertes Zubehör</strong><br />Im Lieferumfang sind eine Grafikkartenhalterung, ein ARGB SYNC-Kabel und weitere wichtige Komponenten für eine einfache Installation und erweiterte Leistung enthalten.</li></ul><br>Produktbeschreibung : Palit GeForce RTX 5080 GameRock - Grafikkarten - GeForce RTX 5080 - 16 GB<BR>Gerätetyp : Grafikkarten<BR>Bustyp : PCI Express 5.0<BR>Grafikprozessor : NVIDIA GeForce RTX 5080<BR>Arbeitsspeicher : 16 GB GDDR7<BR>Speichergeschwindigkeit : 30 Gbps<BR>Core Clock : 2295 MHz<BR>Boost-Takt : 2617 MHz<BR>CUDA-Kerne : 10752<BR>Speicherschnittstelle : 256-bit<BR>Max Auflösung : 7680 x 4320<BR>Anzahl der max. unterstützten Bildschirme : 4<BR>Schnittstellendetails : 3 x DisplayPort <br /> HDMI<BR>API-Unterstützung : DirectX 12 Ultimate, OpenGL 4.6, Vulkan 1.4<BR>Abmessungen (Breite x Tiefe x Höhe) : 7.04 cm x 33.19 cm x 15 cm<BR>Verpackung : Box

            function eikoocDecodeEntities(str) {
                let txt = document.createElement("textarea");
                txt.innerHTML = str;
                return txt.value;
            }

            function etoNeikoocReInitialize() {
                var configObject = { backdrop: 'static', keyboard: false };
                var etoNeikooc = new bootstrap.Modal(document.getElementById('etoNeikooc'), configObject);
                var shopbaseurl = location.protocol + "//" + location.hostname + "/index.php?";

                if (etoNeikooc) {
                    netDeleteAllCookies("/");
                    netSetCookie('cookienote', 'unset', 0);

                    // Perform AJAX request after unsetting cookies
                    fetch(shopbaseurl + 'cl=net_cookie_manager_frontend_controller&fnc=reinitializecookiemanager', {
                        method: 'GET',
                        headers: {
                            'Content-Type': 'application/json'
                        }
                    })
                    .then(response => {
                        if (!response.ok) throw new Error('Network response was not ok');
                        return response.json();
                    })
                    .then(data => {
                        netDeleteAllCookies("/");
                        location.reload();
                    })
                    .catch(error => {
                        console.error('Error reinitializing cookie manager:', error);
                    });
                }
                return false;
            }



            function netGetCookie(cookiename) {
                var name = cookiename + "=";
                var arrayOfCookies = decodeURIComponent(document.cookie).split(';');
                for (var i = 0; i < arrayOfCookies.length; i++) {
                    var aCookie = arrayOfCookies[i];
                    while (aCookie.charAt(0) == ' ') {
                        aCookie = aCookie.substring(1);
                    }
                    if (aCookie.indexOf(name) == 0) {
                        return aCookie.substring(name.length, aCookie.length);
                    }
                }
                return "";
            }

            function netSetCookie(cookiename, cookievalue, daysexpires) {
                var cookieexpires = "";
                if (daysexpires > 0) {
                    var today = new Date();
                    today.setTime(today.getTime() + (daysexpires * 864e5));
                    cookieexpires = "expires=" + today.toUTCString() + ";";
                } else if (daysexpires < 0) {
                    cookieexpires = "expires=Thu, 1 Jan 1970 00:00:01 UTC;";
                }
                document.cookie = cookiename + "=" + cookievalue + ";" + cookieexpires + "path=/";
            }
            /*
            function netDeleteAllCookies(cookiepath = '/') {
                document.cookie.split(';').forEach(function(c) {
                    document.cookie = c.trim().split('=')[0] + '=;expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:01 UTC; path='+cookiepath;
                });
            }
            */

            function netDeleteAllCookies(cookiepath = '/') {
                const domain = location.hostname;
                const domainParts = domain.split('.');

                // Try deleting cookies at each level of the domain hierarchy
                const domainsToTry = [];
                for (let i = 0; i < domainParts.length - 1; i++) {
                    domainsToTry.push('.' + domainParts.slice(i).join('.'));
                }

                document.cookie.split(';').forEach(function (c) {
                    const cookieName = c.trim().split('=')[0];
                    domainsToTry.forEach((domainToTry) => {
                        document.cookie = `${cookieName}=;expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:01 UTC; path=${cookiepath}; domain=${domainToTry}`;
                    });
                });
                document.cookie.split(';').forEach(function(c) {
                    document.cookie = c.trim().split('=')[0] + '=;expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:01 UTC; path='+cookiepath;
                });
            }

const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
                    entries.forEach(entry => {
                        if (entry.isIntersecting) {
                            const lazyBg = entry.target;
                            lazyBg.style.background = lazyBg.getAttribute('data-bg');
                            observer.unobserve(lazyBg);
                        }
                    });
                }, {
                    rootMargin: '200px 0px',
                });

                const observeLazyBackgrounds = () => {
                    const lazyBackgrounds = document.querySelectorAll('.lazy-bg');
                    lazyBackgrounds.forEach(lazyBg => {
                        observer.observe(lazyBg);
                    });
                };

                observeLazyBackgrounds();

                const mutationObserver = new MutationObserver(() => {
                    observeLazyBackgrounds();
                });

                mutationObserver.observe(document.body, {
                    childList: true,
                    subtree: true
                });

document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
                var fe_price_mode = undefined;
                var use_cookie = false;

                if (document.cookie.split('; ').find(row => row.startsWith('fe_vat_mode'))) {
                    use_cookie = true;
                }

                var setFEVatMode = function(fe_price_mode) {
                    var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
                    xhr.open("POST", "https://www.tease-shop.de/index.php?", true);
                    xhr.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded");

                    xhr.send("cl=vatswitchfrontendcontroller&fnc=setFEVatMode&fe_vat_mode=" + fe_price_mode);

                    if (use_cookie) {
                        document.cookie = "fe_vat_mode=" + fe_price_mode;
                    }

                    initFEPriceMode(fe_price_mode);
                };

                var initFEPriceMode = function(fe_price_mode) {
                    var vatSwitch = document.getElementById("vatSwitch");
                    var vatToggleText = document.querySelectorAll(".vat-toggle-text");
                    var nettoPriceContainer = document.querySelectorAll('.netto-price-container');
                    var bruttoPriceContainer = document.querySelectorAll('.brutto-price-container');

                    if (fe_price_mode == 0) {
                        vatSwitch.checked = false;
                        vatToggleText.forEach(function(element) {
                            element.innerHTML = "Netto";
                        });
                        bruttoPriceContainer.forEach(function(element) {
                            element.style.display = 'none';
                        });
                        nettoPriceContainer.forEach(function(element) {
                            element.style.display = 'block';
                        });
                    } else {
                        vatSwitch.checked = true;
                        vatToggleText.forEach(function(element) {
                            element.innerHTML = "Brutto";
                        });
                        nettoPriceContainer.forEach(function(element) {
                            element.style.display = 'none';
                        });
                        bruttoPriceContainer.forEach(function(element) {
                            element.style.display = 'block';
                        });
                    }
                };

                document.addEventListener("change", function(event) {
                    if (event.target.id === "vatSwitch") {
                        if (event.target.checked) {
                            document.querySelectorAll(".vat-toggle-text").forEach(function(el) {
                                el.innerHTML = "Brutto";
                            });
                            setFEVatMode(1);
                        } else {
                            document.querySelectorAll(".vat-toggle-text").forEach(function(el) {
                                el.innerHTML = "Netto";
                            });
                            setFEVatMode(0);
                        }
                    }
                });

                document.addEventListener("click", function (event) {
                    if (event.target.classList.contains('switch-fe-price-toggle')) {
                        if (fe_price_mode === 0) {
                            fe_price_mode = 1;
                        } else {
                            fe_price_mode = 0;
                        }
                        initFEPriceToggle();
                        event.preventDefault();
                    }
                });

                var initFEPriceToggle = function() {
                    var fe_price_mode_text = '';
                    var vatToggleTextElements = document.querySelectorAll('.vat-toggle-text');
                    if (fe_price_mode == 0) {
                        vatToggleTextElements.forEach(function(element) {
                            element.textContent = "Netto";
                        });
                    } else {
                        vatToggleTextElements.forEach(function(element) {
                            element.textContent = "Brutto";
                        });
                    }
                    setFEVatMode(fe_price_mode);
                };

                if (document.querySelectorAll('.switch-fe-price-toggle').length) {
                    initFEPriceToggle();
                }

                if (typeof fe_price_mode === 'undefined') {
                    initFEPriceMode(1);
                } else {
                    initFEPriceMode(fe_price_mode);
                }
            });
(function () {
            document.querySelectorAll('.js-countdown').forEach(item => {
                const targetTime = item.getAttribute('data-target-time');
                if (!targetTime) return;

                const days = item.querySelector('.js-cd-days'),
                      hours = item.querySelector('.js-cd-hours'),

                      seconds = item.querySelector('.js-cd-seconds');

                if (!days || !hours || !minutes || !seconds) {
                    console.warn("Countdown element missing required child elements.");

                countdown(
                    targetDate,
                    ts => {
                        days.innerHTML = ts.days;

                        minutes.innerHTML = ts.minutes;
                        seconds.innerHTML = ts.seconds;
                    },
                    countdown.DAYS | countdown.HOURS | countdown.MINUTES | countdown.SECONDS
                );
            });
